roleset.name: separate with walls

example.name: wall_off-v: usually without arg2
example.text: But even before Wang 's latest financial troubles surfaced , some customers `` were trying to wall off their Wang installations '' so other departments would n't add Wang , says Chris Christiansen , a former Wang marketer who is now a market analyst with Meta Group , a market research firm in Stamford , Conn.

propbank.arg: so other departments would n't add Wang

example.name: walled_off-j
example.text: John 's bedroom is walled off from the rest of the house .

propbank.arg: from the rest of the house

roleset.note: WALL_OFF-V NOTES: Frames file for 'wall off' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from wall.01-v predicate notes)
